drupalNodeEvent.title: Indigenous Peoples’ land rights and development in Taiwan

field_speakers.processed: Assistant Professor Yi-shiuan Yayut Chen (National Chengchi University), Emeritus Professor Richie Howitt (Macquarie University)

field_organizers.processed: Australian Centre on China in the World, The Australian National University

field_description.processed:
Drawing on geographical and ethnological fieldwork with Indigenous Peoples, Assistant Professor Yi-shiuan Yayut Chen (National Chengchi University) will discuss some key challenges of Indigenous Peoples’ land rights in contemporary Taiwan and offer relevant policy recommendation.

Emeritus Professor Richie Howitt (Macquarie University) will provide a response on the Indigenous Australian experience.
